Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1978
Subject: Progress of Wayne Gross
Dear Sir,
Wayne Gross is hitting the ball well at AA Savannah Braves!
He has an AVG of .281, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
